means: 患偷窃狂者，有偷窃癖者

sentence.Network_en: The kleptomaniac has a compulsion to steal.
sentence.Network_cn: 盗窃狂患者,指一个人有一股不可抗拒的偷东西的冲动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以k开头的英语英文单词 ... kleptomania 盗窃癖 kleptomaniac 有窃盗癖的人 knapsack 背包.
kleptomania 偷窃癖kleptomaniac 偷窃癖者kleptophobia 偷窃恐怖症
Boston Legal 104 Sally和Alan分手了 ... Sally 穿得也太暴露吧。。。 Kleptomaniac 偷窃癖 Recant＝ formally 吃了吐.
encrypt的意思中文翻译 ... (=kleptomania) 盗窃癖 (=kleptomaniac) 有盗窃癖的人 cleptophobia 偷窃恐怖.

entry.def: A kleptomaniac is a person who cannot control their desire to steal things, usually because of a medical condition.

means.word_mean: 1. someone with an irrational urge to steal in the absence of an economic motive

auth_sentence.content: It has been suggested to me that I am a kleptomaniac.
